front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended practice for developing energy efficient power-proportional digital architectures

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A set of guidelines for the development of energy efficient and power-proportional digital architectures so that energy is only consumed when computations are underway and energy is reduced in the non-operating state is presented in this recommended practice. The purpose of this practice is to provide guidelines for the designers and developers of digital architectures for creating power-proportionality at different levels of the system.
